COVID-19 VACCINE SAFETY How do I know the vaccine is safe for my teenager?Over 66 million individuals in the U.S. have been fully vaccinated. We now have extensive data, including the research from the Pfizer clinical studies, to show the vaccine to be safe and effective in teenagers. Are Covid-19 vaccines unsafe because they were developed and approved quickly?No. Things have moved faster than normal, but scientists have done everything correctly.
